long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works best on this url: https://www.news247.gr/latest/

Allows you to filter news by giving you the ability to select specific tags - topics to be blocked.

It also removes ads, centers the articles to the screen, and places the page-navigation buttons at the top of the news too (so you don't have to scroll down to change page).

To block a particular topic, click the "x" near the tag name.
To unblock a topic, scroll down and click on any blocked topic button.

This extension has nothing to do with News247. Please use it at your own risk.

I put a lot of time and effort making this free extension. If you enjoy it and you wish to support me, you can donate via this link:
https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=BTK97P92ZF29U
